r.s: A PHP library for dealing with GRDDL.
r.d:
Features
* Different XSLT engines can be used * Merging of RDF results, as per spec * Pretty close to passing GRDDL test suite tests
r.n: Updated project documentation to reflect living in PEAR Request #16457 Please update to HTTP_Request2 doconnor Request #16458 Please update to Net_URL2 doconnor Bug #16459 Doc bug: xsl vs. Xsl Removed old examples (digg no longer renders RDFa, added a bestbuy/good relations example) Updated tests to run with PHP 5.3.3 happily, current PHPUnit
